description: Update base64 encode/decode to use Buffer.fill when available and throw an error if a number is provided.
Add X-Amzn-Trace-Id to list of unsigned headers to prevent signature mismatch errors if the header value is modified while the request is in flight.
Add new regions and endpoints for Amazon Cognito Identity, Amazon Cognito Sync, and Amazon Cognito Identity Provider.
User Pools now offers groups as an easy way to manage users and their permissions.
Add support for Patch Baseline and Patch Compliance APIs
